title: I am also a you
creator_credit: Wonderful Films, Bruce Kerner and Jay Thompson
brief_description: Illustrates similarity between pople of all ages and points of view, using images and quotations. Sources include the Bible, the Talmud, Buddha, Thomas Wolfe and Stanley Kubrick. Suitable for upper secondary level.
